snippet: The agreement would bring the college basketball powerhouses Duke, North Carolina and Syracuse to Barclays Center for at least two March tournaments starting in 2017.
abstract: Atlantic Coast Conference will hold its men’s basketball tournament at Barclays Center in Brooklyn in 2017 and 2018, setting up conference tournament showdown with the Big East, which is held simultaneously at Madison Square Garden.

byline.original: By VIV BERNSTEIN and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: The agreement would bring the college basketball powerhouses Duke, North Carolina and Syracuse to Barclays Center for at least two March tournaments starting in 2017.

headline.main: A.C.C. Tournament Said to Be Heading to Brooklyn in 2017
headline.print_headline: A.C.C. Tournament Said to Be Heading to Brooklyn in 2017
